name: netbox
label: NetBox
description: NetBox is the leading solution for modeling and documenting modern networks. By combining the traditional disciplines of IP address management (IPAM) and datacenter infrastructure management (DCIM) with powerful APIs and extensions, NetBox provides the ideal "source of truth" to power network automation.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.tooltip: Specify the IP address or hostname of the NetBox server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.
fields.description: Specify the IP address or hostname of the NetBox server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: API Token
fields.name: api_key
fields.tooltip: Specify the API Token that is generated through the NetBox server.
fields.description: Specify the API Token that is generated through the NetBox server.

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.tooltip: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.By default, this option is set as True.

operations.title: Get IP Address List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of IP address objects in your NetBox instance based on the IP address IDs, addresses, and other input parameters that you have specified.

parameters.title: IDs
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify IP address object IDs, as comma-separated values, to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify IP address object IDs, as comma-separated values, to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Address
parameters.name: address
parameters.tooltip: Specify the IP addresses, as comma-separated values, whose associated IP address objects you want to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the IP addresses, as comma-separated values, whose associated IP address objects you want to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Roles
parameters.name: role
parameters.tooltip: Specify the roles, as comma-separated values, whose associated IP address objects you want to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the roles, as comma-separated values, whose associated IP address objects you want to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tag
parameters.tooltip: Specify the tags, as comma-separated values, whose associated IP address objects you want to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the tags, as comma-separated values, whose associated IP address objects you want to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Search
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: Specify the search query to filter the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the search query to filter the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Address Family
parameters.name: family
parameters.tooltip: Specify the address family identified, in accordance with RFC 2453, with which you want to filter the results.
parameters.description: Specify the address family identified, in accordance with RFC 2453, with which you want to filter the results.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the operational status of the IP address object to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the operational status of the IP address object to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Order by Field
parameters.name: ordering
parameters.tooltip: Specify the field to use when ordering the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the field to use when ordering the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to skip when returning the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to skip when returning the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Number of results to return per page.
parameters.description: Specify the Number of results to return per page.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify fields in the JSON format to be sent as json_data according to Netbox REST API Documentation
parameters.description: Specify fields in the JSON format to be sent as json_data according to Netbox REST API Documentation
parameters.name: other_fields

operations.title: Get IP Address
operations.description: Retrieves a detailed view of IP address object from your NetBox instance based on the IP address ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: IP Address ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address object in NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address object in NetBox instance.

operations.title: Update IP Address
operations.description: Updates an IP address object from your NetBox instance based on the IP address ID and fields to be updated.

parameters.title: IP Address ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address object in NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address object in NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Fields to be updated
parameters.name: patch_fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify the fields and field values that to update in IP address object on NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the fields and field values that to update in IP address object on NetBox instance.

operations.title: Delete IP Address
operations.description: Deletes an IP address object from your NetBox instance based on given IP address ID that you have specified.

parameters.title: IP Address ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address object in NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the unique integer value identifying this IP address object in NetBox instance.

operations.title: Get Prefix List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of IP address prefix objects in your NetBox instance based on the IDs, prefix, and other input parameters that you have specified. A prefix might be represented as 192.168.1.0/24. Here, 192.168.1.0 is the network address, and /24 denotes the subnet mask.

parameters.title: IDs
parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of prefix IDs to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of prefix IDs to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Prefix
parameters.name: prefix
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of prefix names to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of prefix names to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Sites
parameters.name: site
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of site slug names whose prefix to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of site slug names whose prefix to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Roles
parameters.name: role
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of role name associated with site slugs whose prefix to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of role name associated with site slugs whose prefix to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tag
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of tags names whose prefix to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of tags names whose prefix to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Search Query
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: Specify the search query to filter the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the search query to filter the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Address Family
parameters.name: family
parameters.tooltip: Specify the address family identified, in accordance with RFC 2453, with which you want to filter the results
parameters.description: Specify the address family identified, in accordance with RFC 2453, with which you want to filter the results

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the operational status of the prefix names to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the operational status of the prefix names to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Order by Field
parameters.name: ordering
parameters.tooltip: Specify the field to use when ordering the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the field to use when ordering the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to skip when returning the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the number of records to skip when returning the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Number of results to return per page.
parameters.description: Specify the Number of results to return per page.

parameters.title: Other Fields
parameters.tooltip: Specify fields in the JSON format to be sent as json_data according to Netbox REST API Documentation
parameters.description: Specify fields in the JSON format to be sent as json_data according to Netbox REST API Documentation

operations.title: Get Rack List

parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of rack IDs to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of rack names to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Sites
parameters.name: site
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of site slug names to retrieve its associated rack from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of site slug names to retrieve its associated rack from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Roles
parameters.name: role
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of role slug names to retrieve its associated rack from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of role slug names to retrieve its associated rack from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Tags
parameters.name: tag
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of tag names to retrieve its associated rack from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of tag names to retrieve its associated rack from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Type
parameters.name: type
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of rack type (slug names) to retrieve its associated rack from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of rack type (slug names) to retrieve its associated rack from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Search Query
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Specify the search query to filter the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the operational status of the rack address object to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the operational status of the rack address object to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Order by Field

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: Specify the number of records to skip when returning the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Limit

operations.title: Get Devices List
operations.description: Retrieves a list of all Devices associated with your NetBox instance based on the IDs, names, and other input parameters that you have specified. A Device refers to the various pieces of equipment or hardware that make up a network or data center infrastructure.

parameters.name: id
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of device IDs to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of device IDs to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Name

parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of device names to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of device names to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Region IDs
parameters.name: region_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of region IDs whose associated devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of region IDs whose associated devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Sites
parameters.name: site
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of site slug names whose Devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of site slug names whose Devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Rack IDs
parameters.name: rack_id
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of rack IDs whose Devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of rack IDs whose Devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Tags

parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of tag names whose Devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Device Type
parameters.name: device_type
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of device types (slug names) to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of device types (slug names) to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Asset Tags
parameters.name: asset_tag
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of asset tags associated with devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of asset tags associated with devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Tenants
parameters.name: tenant
parameters.tooltip: Specify comma-separated values of tenant slug names whose associated devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify comma-separated values of tenant slug names whose associated devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Search Query
parameters.name: q
parameters.tooltip: Specify the search query to filter the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the search query to filter the results retrieved from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Status
parameters.name: status
parameters.tooltip: Specify the operational status of the devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.
parameters.description: Specify the operational status of the devices to retrieve from your NetBox instance.

parameters.title: Limit
